summary: Innovative Front-End Developer with 3+ years of experience building and maintaining responsive websites in the service industry. Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript plus modern libraries and frameworks. Passionate about usability and accessibility.

Created modular, responsive templates using modern CSS techniques and JavaScript libraries
Recommended solutions for a streamlined, user friendly interface with the design team.
Fixed a lot of accessibility issues.
Fixed bugs and improved overall application performance leading to over 25% increase in revenue.
Worked with the team and using a new JavaScript framework to develop and ship new features before the required deadline.

Increased company revenue by decreasing downtime by 30%.
